issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5. To reproduce
1) Package KS for mobile web and open on iOS devices
2) Navigate to Base UI>Views>Image Views> Image File

h5. Actual result
Application Error

Android and BBZ10 do not have this issue.

and the log output
{code}
Nov 22 13:05:30 iPhone-5s SpringBoard[16] <Warning>: [defaultImage; snapshot] <com.apple.mobilesafari> failed to get snapshot surface
Nov 22 13:05:35 iPhone-5s kernel[0] <Debug>: launchd[255] Container: /private/var/mobile/Applications/CE0DE042-B9D0-45C4-B263-30FB98FED4AB (sandbox)
Nov 22 13:05:35 iPhone-5s MobileSafari[255] <Error>: ERROR: unable to get the receiver data from the DB!
{code}
fields.summary: MobileWeb: iOS - Image File - Application Error on load
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio, build: 3.2.0.201311211626
Titanium SDK, build 3.2.0.v20131122102444
KS 3.2.0.GA
Xcode 5.0.2
iPhone 5S - Safari7

comments.body: As far as I know, Mobile Web has never been tested on iOS 7 and it's hard to say we support it.
Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
